mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password as passwordHash, nickname, avatar, gender, bio, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM user WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT id, username, password as passwordHash, nickname, avatar, gender, bio, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM user WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (username, password, nickname, avatar, gender, bio) VALUES (#{username}, #{passwordHash}, #{nickname}, #{avatar}, #{gender}, #{bio})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET nickname = #{nickname}, avatar = #{avatar}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
